text: The 2019–20 Club Tijuana season is the 13th season in the football club's history and the 8th consecutive season in the top flight of Mexican football. The club this season will compete in the Apertura and Clausura tournaments as well as in the Copa MX and Leagues Cup. ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:100%; width:35%;" |- !
